lcInstruction.p: The following instructions show how to install a custom plugin and generate output from it using the DITA Open Toolkit.

task.title: Installing a custom plugin on a PC

step.cmd: Locate the zip file com.learningdita.ld_xhtml.zip in the samples folder you downloaded at the beginning of this course.
Inside your DITA OT folder, copy com.learningdita.ld_xhtml.zip into the plugins folder.
